statements.select:
SELECT * FROM ProduceStatisticsCheck pm WHERE ((pm.ProduceStatisticsCheckDate>=#starDate# OR #starDate# IS NULL) AND (pm.ProduceStatisticsCheckDate<=#endDate# OR #endDate# IS NULL)) AND ((pm.ProduceStatisticsCheckId>=#produceStatisticsCheckId1# OR #produceStatisticsCheckId1# IS NULL) AND (pm.ProduceStatisticsCheckId<=#produceStatisticsCheckId2# OR #produceStatisticsCheckId2# IS NULL))
AND ((pm.PronoteHeaderID>=#pronoteId0# OR #pronoteId0# IS NULL) AND (pm.PronoteHeaderID<=#pronoteId1# OR #pronoteId1# IS NULL))
